summary: In order to find her father in Surinam Grace is forced to take some desperate measures. Grace is the only black child of an all-white family, desperate to find out everything about her ... See full summary »
cast: Kees Boot|Gustav Borreman|Leny Breederveld|Manoushka Zeegelaar Breeveld|Chris Comvalius|Glenn Durfort|Lange Frans|Loes Haverkort|Katja Herbers|Marlies Heuer|Micha Hulshof|Tanja Jess|Beppie Melissen|Lotje Molin|Michiel Romeyn|Terence Schreurs|Sieger Sloot|Waldemar Torenstra|Zoë van der Kust|Harm van der Sanden|Lies Visschedijk|Mandela Wee Wee|Aisa Winter|Yes-R
title: Mijn Opa de Bankrover
